textAfterTable: Current Democracies Universitat Pompeu Fabra Session Code Price Start & End Dates Application Due Date Forms & Payment Due Date Master's Degree 3 2014 IBRD4314 $20,000 Late Sep, 2014 - Late Jun, 2015 Jun 1, 2014 Jun 15, 2014 Pricing Notes: The following scholarships are offered by the Pompeu Fabra University for Master's Degree Participants. Please follow the links provided for eligibility requirements and additional details: Foundation Talent IDEC Scholarships The Continuing Education Institute Private Foundation-UPF (IDEC in Spanish) Scholarship program is geared toward helping talented candidates with limited resources to access Barcelona School of Management MSC degrees of at least 60 ECTS credits. The scholarships cover 25% or 50% of the master's degree tuition. MSc Merit Scholarship The Merit Scholarship is targeted at MSC candidates who are able to prove a high academic performance within their fields of study. Those granted the merit scholarship are eligible for up to 20% fee reduction. UPF-BSM Partner Universities MSc Scholarship The UPF Partner Universities Scholarship is targeted at MSc candidates who have graduated from any of the UPF's partner universities. Those granted the Partner Universities Scholarship are eligible for up to 20% fee reduction.
